summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to solid waste reduction; establishing license requirements for publishers of yellow pages phone books; establishing an opt-out registry and a recovery fee for yellow pages phone books, and amending the Seattle Municipal Code by creating a new Chapter 6.255.
note: 9/28/10 vote to hold one week passed by a vote of 5-4 (Opposed, Burgess, Conlin, Licata, O'Brien)
